tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE competitor_patents (
    patent_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_name VARCHAR(255),
    competitor_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry_sector VARCHAR(100),
    patent_filing_date DATE,
    patent_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE competitor_patents (
    patent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry_sector VARCHAR(255),
    patent_description TEXT,
    patent_owner VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_inventors (
    inventor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inventor_name VARCHAR(255),
    inventor_company VARCHAR(255),
    patent_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patent_id) REFERENCES competitor_patents(patent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_citations (
    citation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    citing_patent_id INT,
    cited_patent_id INT,
    citation_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (citing_patent_id) REFERENCES competitor_patents(patent_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (cited_patent_id) REFERENCES competitor_patents(patent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_result TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patent_id) REFERENCES competitor_patents(patent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_files (
    file_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name VARCHAR(255),
    file_format VARCHAR(50),
    file_size INT,
    patent_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patent_id) REFERENCES competitor_patents(patent_id)
);
